import { NavLink , Link} from "react-router-dom"; import playerLogo from "./video-logo1.png" import React from "react"; const Sidebar = () => { const [isDesktop, setDesktop] = React.useState(window.innerWidth > 720); const updateMedia = () => { setDesktop(window.innerWidth > 620); }; React.useEffect(() => { window.addEventListener("resize", updateMedia); return () => window.removeEventListener("resize", updateMedia); }); return ( <>
{isDesktop ?

) } export default Sidebar;
